name: Wealth or Health
description:
Wealth or Health is a roguelike game created for the BTP GameJam 2021.

The basic premise is that the more money you have, the less health you have. Fight your way through a procedurally generated dungeon and see how far you can get.

All code made by me
All art (at least what isn't a square) drawn by me
All music made by me
Sounds generated from https://sfxr.me/
Font used: https://www.dafont.com/free-pixel.font

Screenshots currently outdated, will update later
